protocol_core.protocol_description: For single-cell RNA-seq experiments, live and singlet gated cells were further gated to sort 1) TCM; CD3+CD4+CD8α/CD14/CD19-CD45RA-CCR7+, 2) TEM; CD3+CD4+CD8α/CD14/CD19-CD45RA-CCR7-, 3) TEMRA; CD3+CD4+CD8α/CD14/CD19-CD45RA+CCR7-, 4) IL-7Rhigh TEMRA (CD4-CTL precursors); CD3+CD4+CD8α/CD14/CD19-CD45RA+CCR7-CD127high, 5) IL-7R- TEMRA (CD4-CTL effectors); CD3+CD4+CD8α/CD14/CD19-CD45RA+CCR7- CD127-. Single cells were directly sorted into 96 well plate with lysis buffer for downstream processing using Smart-seq2 method
